document_data.caption: A map showing the Pyramid of Re (labeled #18) in the City of the Gods.
document_data.name: Pyramid of Re
document_data.mainbody: The '''Pyramid of Re''' was the resting place of [[Re]], the former head of the [[Mulhorandi pantheon]].{{Cite interactive atlas|490 Skuld}}
document_data.Location: The Pyramid was located in central section of [[Skuld]]'s [[Skuld/City of the Gods|City of the Gods]] in the north central section of the city.
document_data.Description: The Pyramid was quite large, measuring roughly {{SI|200|ft|long=yes}} on each side.
